**Payment Posting Times**Any utility payments, made in office, after 3:00 PM will be posted on the next business day.

[View Bills or See Balance Due](https://www.paymentservicenetwork.com/Login.aspx?acc=rt20226)
  
Click here to view your bill or balance due. You need to register the first time in order to view your bill and receive notifications when your bills are ready.

[ACH Form (Direct Payment Application)](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/page/0077/docs/Fill%20In%20-%20Direct%20Payment%20Application%20-%206-15.pdf)
  
Completed form must be submitted, with a voided check, to our Customer Service Office at 402 W. Navasota.

Pay by Phone

Call our Customer Service office at (254) 729-3293.  Make sure to have your bill handy to provide your customer account number. **Visa**, **Master Card** or **Discover** cards are accepted.

Pay by Mail

Send a Check/Money Order to -  P.O. Box 227 Groesbeck, TX 76642

Groesbeck Texas - A Great Place to Live, Play, and Work
